subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In his first shot at baseball immortality, Tom Glavine pitched six masterly innings Tuesday. But Guillermo Mota gave up the tying run in the eighth to deny Glavine his personal milestone.
snippet: In his first shot at baseball immortality, Tom Glavine pitched six masterly innings Tuesday. But Guillermo Mota gave up the tying run in the eighth to deny Glavine his personal milestone.
